original_title: Rocco e Marika su e giu per l'Italia Scambista
overview: This movie is like a trip back to the '90s, when I used to make movies with people who are not professionals, just like in the movie 'Never Say Never To Rocco', where we had over 200 people, and none of them were part of the industry. To me, it has always been important to get closer to real people's sexuality. Marika understood my purpose very well. This means everybody from pretty to less attractive deserves to have fun; this is how I have alwasy thought about sex. We were very easy-going during this trip. We admired the people that we met and we ended up having a great time. The scenes are so diverse, I can't pick just one as the best. My personal favorites are the last two scenes: A lot of people at the party, including couples, and the final gangbang, which was a special gift to Marika.
title: Rocco e Marika su e giu per l'Italia Scambista
